read_headers[source]

read_headers(header_file)

Reads the header file which consists of lines starting with the table name followed by a : and the header. It returns a dictionary of table names and their associated header lines.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

read__write_from_sep_sv[source]

read__write_from_sep_sv(filename, out_filename, in_sep=None, out_sep=None, encoding=None, chop_end_field=True)

Reads in a sep file and outputs in proper csv

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
